Scan QR to validate your trips as a rider
Validate your riders when you are the carpool driver
Do you need a stop close to your location?
Please be sure to install the latest version in order to use the application.
You are now registered to %1$s, you can start using it by the next trip.
Please enter the verification code sent to the email address below:
Please enter the verification code sent to the phone number:
Please add your phone number so that you can communicate with other carpoolers. \n\nSMS code will be sent to verify your number.
Please select the campus on which you will be using the Flexigo services.
View riders/drivers around your location and swipe right the ones with whom you’d be willing to carpool, swipe left the ones you wouldn’t.
When there are matching requests, we will notify both parties.
Reset your password by entering your email address.
You can remove ticks from times which you don\'t want to use the service.
Your riders should scan your QR to validate your trip together.
Open the camera when you enter the page
Scan the QR code on the vehicle.
Your boarding record has been received.
Switching to a non-SOV mode you could save 2 trees a month!
You must allow call phone permission in settings to perform this operation
You must allow camera permission in settings to perform this operation
You must allow location permission in settings to perform this operation
Your request has been successfully received. Thanks for your feedback.
You must fill all the fields completely.
Flexigo is an Vektor Mobility brand
Are you sure you would like to log out?
You must first choose a campus.
by monthly cost, daily hours & monthly emission
There are no carpool driver candidates for these hours around your location yet. \n\nWe will notify you when new drivers join!
There are no carpool driver candidates for these hours around your location yet. \n\nWe will notify you when new drivers join!
There are colleagues around your location willing to carpool.\nWould you like to volunteer to drive?
There was an error processing the photo, please try again.
Your shuttle station replacement request will be sent. Do you confirm ?
Phone number can not be find.
Your request has been received. When approved you will be informed.
You can see available vehicles on your company
You can report your past usage or initiate live usage
You can start to drive instantly
You can demand a car for future uses
You can reserve a vehicle for a future meeting, event, or other use.
You can create your intercity vehicle request from this menu.
You can initiate your live usage
You can finalize your live usage
You can report your past usage
You can see the status of your reservations
Make sure you have access to parking area.
Rental fees may vary depending on the length of time they are located
No one else can drive the car.
Time remaining to report internal damage
Select the days on which you\'d like to use this shuttle.
Tell me what the problem is. We\'re ready to help you.
Select the area of the damage.
Take a close-up, clear photo of the damaged area.
No new damage to the car.
I didn\'t leave my personal belongings in the car.
I confirm the accuracy of the information I provide.
Take a photo of the car parked.
Tell me where the car is
Make sure you are within 10 meters of the car.
Once the car doors are opened, you will start renting and check for internal damage.
Your driving will be finished after the doors are locked.
Make sure you are 10 meters from the vehicle.
Congratulations, your car rental request has been successfully completed. Your car is waiting for you.
Your experience is valuable to us.
We value your feedback and experience. Can you score how your journey was?
We value your feedback and experience. Can you rate your application experience?
Please share your experience with us
The doors could not be locked. Please call the Call Center
Doors could not be opened. Please call the Call Center
Your distance cannot be detected with the vehicle. Please go to the side of the vehicle and scan the QR code on the driver\'s door!
QR code did not match, please contact our call center.
You can track your reservation on the shuttle home page and cancel it if needed.
Don\'t have an account yet? Sign up
We couldn\'t get your location info, please try again.
First, you need to select park.
There is no suitable vehicle in the park of your choice.
Your car reservation request will be generated with the information dated above. Do you confirm ?
Do you want to see the reservation list?
This allows you to make a future reservation to the stop, it is not currently active.
You are not authorized to use this feature.
You can view your route information.
You can view your comments and complaints.
You can find information about the application and your profile.
You can view the stops near where you want to go.
You can report the days when you will not use the service.
By scanning the QR codes on the vehicles, you can report that you are at the service
You can choose the stop where you want to see the details.
Click on the details to see the route.
You can take the action you want to take about the stop.
You can add new comments and complaints
Opt-in time is over. To reserve a seat, please check all routes 30 minutes before departure time.
Request a ride to your destination
Would you like to examine their use?
Share your ride with others with driver.
You don\'t need to carry your taxi slips with you anymore.
Let us suggest all transportation alternatives according to your calendar.
You can reach the pool vehicles in the company.
Tell us where you want to go and leave the rest to us.\nWe will get you there!
Just upload your slip photo and report your taxi usage then wait for your pay back.
Reserve one, and use it when the time comes.
You can review all your usage history on this screen.
Cheaper and healthier than taxi.\nReserve, drive, leave...
You will be informed about your usage with the information mentioned above. Do you confirm ?
You are one of the riders
You can request a ride for someone else
Do you want to cancel only the reservation you have selected or all reservations?
There should be at least half an hour difference between start and end dates.
Your reservation request will be cancelled.
Time required to start reservation. You can start to drive 10 minutes before the start time.
Before going to the vehicle, take the vehicle key from the security guard
If you have reached the vehicle, you can press the open doors button to open the doors and start the rental
You can get help by calling us
Your live usage is initiating, do you confirm?
There must be at least 30 minutes difference between start and end dates.
Enter the km value of car when you get the car
Enter the km value of car when you leave the car
When the doors are opened, use will begin and you will be able to report internal damage in the first 5 minutes.
Your use will be finished after the doors are locked.
Make sure you have the key before you start to inspections.
Parking Lot value can not found.
Would you like to restart the user manual?
By making a reservation at this stop, you can get on the service that passes that stop on the date you choose. You can create a reservation by choosing the date and arrival / departure.
This application cannot run on a rooted device.
Would you like to use carpooling?

If you opt in to carpooling, your name will be displayed to other riders and drivers and you will be able to select with whom you’d like to share your trips. \n\n If you prefer to stay out, you can still view the riders and drivers around your location.

Your current status is set as \'available to drive\'. You can view other drivers but you cannot vote them in the driver mode. \n\n If you\'d like to carpool as a rider, you can change your status to vote and match with drivers.

You\'ve already selected several possible riders.If you change your status to, \'unavailable to drive\', you won\'t be visible to riders and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re available to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.

You\'ve already selected several possible drivers.If you change your status to, \'available to drive\', you won\'t be visible to drivers and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re unavailable to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.

You\'ve already selected several possible drivers.If you change your status to, \'unavailable to drive\', you won\'t be visible to drivers and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re available to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.
Are you sure you\'d like to end your matching with %1$s?

You're now carpooling with %1$s. 

Don't forget to scan your driver's barcode on each ride.

If you quit carpooling with them, don't forget to let us know by hitting the delete button on their card.
Please fill the information of all staff
Passenger count and added staff count does not match
Cities to go to the mission

You should also enter the reason for choosing a large luggage volume / SUV vehicle in the explanation field.

Enter vehicle model (Clio, Polo, Golf etc.)
You can see the details of your active usage and take action.
There is no proper stop for this route
%1$s you be taking your shuttle on %2$s. The driver will be notified.

You do not have a scheduled service line.

On %1$s, will be received for the %2$s group at %3$s
You will be absent on the route %1$s between %2$s.
You will use the trip on the route %1$s between %2$s.
Please provide approximate hours so that we can match you with other carpoolers.
No routes found in the direction you have requested.
%1$s departure shuttle demand request will be cancelled. Are you sure?
Your shuttle change request has been received, you will be informed soon.
Do you want to change your shuttle route to %1$s permanently?
Do you want to permanently change the line/stop you use regularly?
Please confirm your reservation for %1$s on %2$s at %3$s
Your reservation for the route %5$s %4$s from %3$s on %2$s %1$s has been made.
Please approve that you will be absent on the trip to %2$s with arrival hour of %1$s?

We have received your request. You will be informed when the route is planned
Description. Addition to the description, please specify the reason of picking SUV or Large Baggage car.
Flexigo needs to access your location to show the nearby service points and provide a smooth experience.
Your home address is required in the first place to calculate your commute options.
I want to register to a regular vanpool/shuttle route.
I\'m looking for a one-off shuttle trip.
I want to make a shuttle reservation for a hybrid schedule.
Please take a few minutes to answer a quick survey.
It will help us understand your Commute Preferences and present you options.\n\n\ You can update your answers any time later from the Commute Preferences menu.
Please view the route and state your preference.
I have read and accept terms and conditions for vanpool drivers.
I accept to opt-in as a driver
I accept to opt-in as a rider only
I don’t want to use this route
Once replies from all riders are collected, the route will be finalized and you will be notified
You need to add your driving license to be eligible as a van driver.
No routes found passing near your home location.
We have received your request for a nearby stop. You will be informed when a new stop is added.
Your request for a nearby stop is being processed.
Will you be absent on the selected day only or more?
Please select the dates you will be absent for
How is your impression of the product?
Thanks for helping us improve our app!
What time do you prefer to arrive at / leave the workplace?
